rdf:Description.dc:title: Small gaps between primes
rdf:Description.dc:creator: James, Maynard
rdf:Description.dc:description: The prime \(k\)-tuples and small gaps between prime numbers are considered. Using a refinement of the Goldston-Pintz-Yildirim sieve method [\textit{D. A. Goldston} et al., Ann. Math. (2) 170, No. 2, 819--862 (2009; Zbl 1207.11096)] the author proves, for instance, the following estimates \[ \liminf_{n\to\infty}\,(p_{n+m}-p_n)\ll m^3\text{{e}}^{4m}, \quad \liminf_{n\to\infty}\,(p_{n+1}-p_n)\leq 600 \] with an absolute constant in sign \(\ll\). Here \(m\) is a natural number, and \(p_{\,l}\) denote the \(l\)-th prime number.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Princeton University, Mathematics Department, Princeton, NJ
